description: Optimize QQ notification without ROOT Support the original QQ / Tim / QQ Lite. Force the decay QQ notification evolve into a modern style, including features as followsï¼š - Adapted to native sub-channel notifications, and set different prompts for private chats, group chats, special care, and space messages. - Using native notification volume and vibration, it is highly compatible with smart binds and watches. - Following Android messaging app notification style best practices, it supports displaying multiple groups of conversations and historical messages. - Supported as plugin or standalone.
